Description: This function updates an OpenAI Assistant with the specified parameters.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code: Update-OAIAssistant -Id "assistant123" -Model "gpt-3.5-turbo" -Name "My Assistant" -Description "This is my assistant" -Instructions "Use this assistant to perform various tasks" -Tools "PowerShell", "Visual Studio Code" -FileIds "file1", "file2" -Metadata @{ "key1" = "value1"; "key2" = "value2" }
